str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From a compound of hupo and histemi; a setting under, i.e. concretely, essence, or abstractly, assurance.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.
A proof, possibly: a persuasion; reproof. From elegcho; proof, conviction.
A thing done, a deed, action; a matter, an affair. From prasso; a deed; by implication, an affair; by extension, an object.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
